Title: Movie Festival
Description: In a movie festival n movies will be shown. You know the starting and ending time of each movie. What is the maximum number of movies you can watch entirely?
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the number of movies. 
 After this, there are n lines that describe the movies. Each line has two integers a and b: the starting and ending times of a movie.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the maximum number of movies.
